name: Backstage Face and Body Foundation
description: A versatile foundation with a natural finish, suitable for both face and body.

name: Addict Lip Sugar Scrub
description: A lip scrub that nourishes and preps lips for smooth, even color.

name: Rouge Dior Couture Lipstick
description: A luxurious, long-lasting lipstick with intense color and hydration.

name: Airbrush Flawless Finish Setting Powder
description: A lightweight setting powder for a flawless, airbrushed finish.
cover: Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Finish Setting Powder.jpg

name: Beautiful Skin Concealer
description: A concealer that hydrates, brightens, and conceals for a fresh, natural look.

name: Hollywood Contour Wand
description: An easy-to-blend contour wand for natural-looking definition.

name: Mini Soft Pinch Liquid Blush
description: A dewy, long-lasting liquid blush with a soft, natural flush of color.
cover: Rare Beauty Mini Soft Pinch Liquid Blush.jpg

name: Golden Eyeshadow Palette
description: A richly pigmented eyeshadow palette with warm, golden tones.

name: Perfect Strokes Matte Liquid Liner
description: An ultra-black, long-lasting liquid liner with a precision tip.
cover: Rare Beauty Perfect Strokes Matte Liquid Liner.jpg

name: Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara Mini
description: A volumizing mascara that adds length and fullness to lashes.
